node.name: Swarovski Z6i 3-18x50 ILL (BT) 4A Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The Z6I 3-18X50 ILL (BT) 4A rifle scope from Swarovski Optik with 18x magnification is clearly intended for distant targets. The Z6i 3-18×50 (BT) offers you the assurance of a large field of view
node.description:
The Swarovski Z6I 3-18X50 ILL (BT) 4A rifle scope with 18x magnification is clearly intended for distant targets.

The Z6i 3-18x50 (BT) offers you the assurance of a large field of view, providing HD optics and lateral parallax correction, this scope is intended for long-range shooting. The fine illuminated reticle of this scope is perfect for accurate shooting at twilight.

 

 

Swarovski Optik Z6I 3-18X50 ILL (BT) 4A Technical Data:

Magnification 3-18x
Effective objective lens diameter (mm) 29.0-50
Exit pupil diameter (mm) 9.5-2.8
Exit pupil distance (mm) (Eye relief) 95
Field of view (ft/100 yds / m/100 m) 39.9-6.6 / 13.3-2.2
Field of view (degrees) 7.6-1.3
Field of view, apparent (degrees) 22.8
Dioptric compensation (dpt) -3 to +2
Light transmission (%) 90
Twilight factor acc. to ISO 14132-1 8.5-30
Impact point corr. per click elevation / windage (in/100 yds / mm/100 m) 0.36/10 / 0.18/5
Max. elevation / windage adjustment range (in/100 yds / m/100 m) 64.8-36 / 1.8-1
Parallax correction (yds / m) 55-∞ / 50-∞
Objective filter thread M 52x0.75

node.name: Swarovski Z6i 2.5-15x56 (BT) 4A Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The illuminated Z6i 2.5-15×56 P BT rifle scope from Swarovski Optik provides HD optics and lateral parallax correction, guaranteeing a faultless image.
node.description:
The illuminated Swarovski Z6i 2.5-15x56 (BT) 4A Rifle Scope is intended for hunting in poor light conditions.

The 6x zoom scope offers an effective range of use with a field of view suitable for hunting to a 15x magnification, which is of great benefit particularly for accurate long-range shots.

HD optics and lateral parallax correction guarantee you a faultless image.

 

 

Swarovski Z6i 2.5-15x56 (BT) 4A Technical Data:

Magnification 2.5-15x
Effective objective lens diameter (mm) 24.0-56
Exit pupil diameter (mm) 9.5-3.8
Exit pupil distance (mm) (Eye relief) 95
Field of view (ft/100 yds / m/100 m) 49.5-8.1 / 16.5-2.7
Field of view (degrees) 9.4-1.5
Field of view, apparent (degrees) 23.2
Dioptric compensation (dpt) -3 to +2
Light transmission (%) 91
Twilight factor acc. to ISO 14132-1 7.1-29
Impact point corr. per click (in/100 yds / mm/100 m) 0.36 / 10
Max. elevation / windage adjustment range (in/100 yds / m/100 m) 64.8-36 / 1.8-1
Parallax correction (yds / m) 55-∞ / 50-∞
Objective filter thread M 58x0.75

node.name: Swarovski Z6i 1-6x24 CD-I Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The outstanding field of view offered by the Z6i 1-6×24 from Swarovski Optik gives you the edge over others and aids target acquisition. For example, in narrow forest pathways, you can identify your target quickly and accurately
node.description:
The outstanding field of view offered by the Swarovski Z6i 1-6x24 Rifle Scope gives you the edge over others and aids target acquisition. In narrow forest pathways, you can identify your target quickly and accurately. The 6x magnification means that you are also perfectly equipped for medium distances.

The illuminated Z6i 1-6x24 stands out thanks to its 127.5 ft / 42.5 m field of view with a 1x magnification, which provides a larger overview when hunting. The 6x zoom provides the finest detail.

 

Swarovski Optik Z6i 1-6X24 CD-I Rifle Scope Technical Data:

Magnification 1-6x
Effective objective lens diameter (mm) 9.6-24
Exit pupil diameter (mm) 9.6-4.0
Exit pupil distance (mm) (Eye relief) 95
Field of view (ft/100 yds / m/100 m) 127.5-20.4 / 42.5-6.8
Field of view (degrees) 23.8-3.9
Field of view, apparent (degrees) 23.4
Dioptric compensation (dpt) -3 to +2
Light transmission (%) 90
Twilight factor acc. to ISO 14132-1 2.8-12
Impact point corr. per click (in/100 yds / mm/100 m) 0.54 / 15
Max. elevation / windage adjustment range (in/100 yds / m/100 m) 72 / 2
Objective filter thread M 27x0.75

node.name: Swarovski X5 5-25x56 1/8 MOA PLEX Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The Swarovski X5 25×56 Rifle Scope provides precise 1/8 MOA impact point adjustment, combined with the fine PLEX reticle, allows you to hit every target accurately.
node.description:
The Swarovski X5 25x56 Rifle Scope provides precise 1/8 MOA impact point adjustment, combined with the fine PLEX reticle, allows you to hit every target accurately, even at the maximum distance.

 

 

X5 5-25X56 1/8MOA PLEX Rifle Scope Technical Data:

Magnification 5-25x
Effective objective lens diameter (mm) 48.0-56
Exit pupil diameter (mm) 9.5-2.3
Exit pupil distance (mm) (Eye relief) 95
Field of view (ft/100 yds / m/100 m) 21-4.5 / 7-1.5
Field of view (degrees) 4.0-0.8
Field of view, apparent (degrees) 21.1
Dioptric compensation (dpt) -3 to +2
Light transmission (%) 90
Twilight factor acc. to ISO 14132-1 15.5-37.4
Impact point corr. per click (in/100 yds / mm/100 m) 0.13 / 3.6
Max. elevation / windage adjustment range (in/100 yds / m/100 m) 86.4/54 / 2.4/1.5
Impact point corr. per click (MOA) 1/8
Max. elevation / windage adjustment range (MOA) 82/50
Elevation/windage impact point correction per rotation (clicks) 100/90
Option to go below sight-in distance SUBZERO (clicks) 80
Parallax correction (yds / m) 55-∞ / 50-∞
Objective filter thread M 58x0.75

node.name: Vortex Crossfire II 3-9X40 Dead Hold Rifle Scope
node.short_description: High performance meets economy. Clear, tough, and bright, the popular Vortex Crossfire II 3-9X40 Dead Hold Rifle Scope is built to exceed the performance standards of similarly-priced riflescopes.
node.description:
High performance meets economy. Clear, tough, and bright, the popular Vortex Crossfire II 3-9X40 Dead Hold Rifle Scope is built to exceed the performance standards of similarly-priced riflescopes.

Long eye relief, a fast-focus eyepiece, fully multi-coated lenses, and resettable MOA turrets are hallmarks of the series.

 

 

Vortex Crossfire II 3-9X40 Dead Hold Rifle Scope Specifications:

Magnification 3-9x
Objective Lens Diameter 40 mm
Eye Relief 3.8 inches
Field of View 34.1-12.6 ft/100 yds
Tube Size 1 inch
Turret Style Capped
Adjustment Graduation 1/4 MOA
Travel Per Rotation 15 MOA
Max Elevation Adjustment 60 MOA
Max Windage Adjustment 60 MOA
Parallax Setting 100 yards
Length 12 inches
Weight 15 oz

node.name: Hawke Airmax 30 Compact 4-16x44 AMX IR Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The Hawke Airmax 30 Compact 4-16×44 AMX IR Rifle Scope, designed especially for air rifle use, featuring the new AMX reticle and offers side focus down to 10 yards.
node.description:
The Hawke Airmax 30 Compact 4-16x44 AMX IR Rifle Scope, designed especially for air rifle use, featuring the new AMX reticle and offers side focus down to 10 yards.

Hawke Airmax 30 Compact 4-16x44 AMX IR Rifle Scope Features:

Wide Angle optical system ideal for varmint/airgun
Lightweight and compact construction – short eye relief
16 layer fully multi-coated optics for exceptional clarity
Side focus control for parallax adjustment to infinity
30mm mono-tube chassis for superior strength
Glass etched reticle with red illumination
6 levels of brightness with off positions in-between
1⁄10 MRAD capped, resettable target turrets
Fast focus eyebell and high torque zoom ring
